markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Eagle](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2968)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

These large birds of prey swoop down from incredible heights to snatch fish and small mammals in their powerful talons. Eagles nest atop high trees or steep cliffs that provide a commanding view of the surrounding area.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 13

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Eagle](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2968)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=531" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 137 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +6; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=69)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +3

**Con** +1

**Int** -4

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 

**Fort** +4 

**Ref** +6 

**Will** +2 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 6

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 10 feet, fly 60 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
beak +6 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
talon +6 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d4 slashing

**Eagle Dive** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The eagle Flies up to double its fly Speed in a straight line, descending at least 10 feet, and then makes a talon Strike.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-406" />
name: Eagle

Recall Knowledge - Animal (Nature): DC 13 Unspecific Lore : DC 11 Specific Lore : DC 8 Eagle Source Monster Core pg. 137 1.1 Perception +6; low-light vision Languages Skills Acrobatics +6 Str +0 Dex +3 Con +1 Int -4 Wis +1 Cha +1 --- AC 15 Fort +4 Ref +6 Will +2 HP 6 --- Speed 10 feet, fly 60 feet Melee Single Action beak +6 (Finesse), Damage 1d6 piercing Melee Single Action talon +6 (Agile, Finesse), Damage 1d4 slashing Eagle Dive Two Actions The eagle Flies up to double its fly Speed in a straight line, descending at least 10 feet, and then makes a talon Strike.
